## NFTCollection class

A collection of associated NFTs

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NFTCollection 
```

## Example


```jsx
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/solana";

const sdk = ThirdwebSDK.fromNetwork("devnet");
sdk.wallet.connect(signer);

// Get the interface for your NFT collection program
const program = await sdk.getNFTCollection("{{contract_address}}");
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [balance(mintAddress)](./solana.nftcollection.balance.md) |  | Get the NFT balance of the connected wallet |
|  [balanceOf(walletAddress, mintAddress)](./solana.nftcollection.balanceof.md) |  | Get the NFT balance of the specified wallet |
|  [get(mintAddress)](./solana.nftcollection.get.md) |  | Get the metadata for a specific NFT |
|  [getAll()](./solana.nftcollection.getall.md) |  | Get the metadata for all NFTs on this collection |
|  [getAllNFTAddresses()](./solana.nftcollection.getallnftaddresses.md) |  | Get the mint addresses for all NFTs on this collection |
|  [getMetadata()](./solana.nftcollection.getmetadata.md) |  | Get the metadata for this program. |
|  [mint(metadata)](./solana.nftcollection.mint.md) |  | Mint NFTs to the connected wallet |
|  [mintAdditionalSupply(mintAddress)](./solana.nftcollection.mintadditionalsupply.md) |  | Mint additional supply of an NFT to the connected wallet |
|  [mintAdditionalSupplyTo(to, mintAddress)](./solana.nftcollection.mintadditionalsupplyto.md) |  | Mint additional supply of an NFT to the specified wallet |
|  [mintTo(to, metadata)](./solana.nftcollection.mintto.md) |  | Mint an NFT to the specified wallet |
|  [supplyOf(mintAddress)](./solana.nftcollection.supplyof.md) |  | Get the supply of NFT editions minted from a specific NFT |
|  [transfer(receiverAddress, mintAddress)](./solana.nftcollection.transfer.md) |  | Transfer the specified NFTs to another wallet |
